text: Margaret Leighton (26 February 1922-13 January 1976) was an English actress. She acted in many television shows and movies all across western Europe and North America. Leighton was born in England. She died from multiple sclerosis. Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Deaths from multiple sclerosis Category:1922 births Category:1976 deaths
title: Margaret Leighton
